short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Frost is a Chrome Extension that writes a custom cold email template for prospects when you visit their website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Frost is a program that generates customized outreach messages depending on what website you're visiting. This is perfect for sales, partnerships, or other outreach that's normally done "cold." Frost takes the cold out of cold outreach.
